bibl.title: Excavations in Akhmim, Egypt. Continuity and Change in City Life from Late Antiquity to the Present. First Report. (BAR International Series. 590.)
bibl.note: nombr. figg. et profils, 4 cartes, 23 pll.
Fouilles de 2 secteurs d'Akhmîm. - Pp. 1-16: Chap. 1. Présentation générale du site et bibliographie.
McNALLY Sheila and Ivancica DVORZAK SCHRUNK, Excavations in Akhmim, Egypt. Continuity and Change in City Life from Late Antiquity to the Present. First Report. (BAR International Series. 590.)
Oxford, Tempus Reparatum, 1993, 4°, vi-110 pp., nombr. figg. et profils, 4 cartes, 23 pll. ISBN 0-86054-760-4. £24.
